data.Sentence_cn: 安.斯特林夫人在穿过森林追赶两个男人时，她并没有考虑到所冒的风险。
data.Sentence: Mrs. Anne Sterling did not think of the risk she was taking when she ran through a forest after two men.

data.Sentence_cn: 刚才，当她和孩子们正在森林边上野餐的时候，这两个人冲到她跟前，企图抢走她的手提包。
data.Sentence: They had rushed up to her while she was having a picnic at the edge of a forest with her children and tried to steal her handbag.

data.Sentence_cn: 在争抢中，手提包的带断了，包落入这两个人手里，他们拔腿跑进了树林。
data.Sentence: In the struggle, the strap broke and, with the bag in their possession, both men started running through the trees.

data.Sentence_cn: 斯特林夫人非常气愤，向着他们追了过去。
data.Sentence: Mrs. Sterling got so angry that she ran after them.

data.Sentence_cn: 只追了一会儿便上气不接下气了，但她还是继续追赶。
data.Sentence: She was soon out of breath, but she continued to run.

data.Sentence_cn: 当她赶上他们时，发现他们已经坐了下来，正翻着包里的东西。
data.Sentence: When she caught up with them, she saw that they had sat down and were going through the contents of the bag,
so she ran straight at them.

data.Sentence_cn: 这两个人吓了一跳，扔下提包逃跑了。
data.Sentence: The men got such a fright that they dropped the bag and ran away.

data.Sentence_cn: “这提包带需要修理，”斯特林夫人事后说道，
data.Sentence: “The strap needs mending,”said Mrs. Sterling later,
